automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_brightness_sequence'
alias: Office WLED On - Living Room to 70 then Office to 100
description: "When Office WLED turns on, set Living Room to 70% then Office to 100% with delays"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    to: 'on'
conditions: []
action:
  - delay: '00:00:02'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 70
  - delay: '00:00:03'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 100
